name: Tangled
summary: Disney's Tangled: The Video Game takes young girls (recommended for ages 6-11) on a storybook comedy adventure on the Nintendo DS. In this visually entertaining journey inspired by the 3D animated film, girls will explore familiar environments, take on engaging quests and play a host of mini games along the way. Players will discover multiple activities, rejuvenate & nurture characters in need, befriend animals and ensure that adventurous Rapunzel aided by the swashbuckling Flynn overcomes challenging escapades to untangle her dreams. Players can also collect a variety of colors to draw and paint the Tower wall.
